document.full_text: the organization of the petroleum exporting countries said it expects oil demand to grow by 1.4 million barrels per day (bpd) this year, around steady on its previous forecast and also in line with iea figures.
document.title: opec keeps 2011 oil demand growth forecast steady
lines_and_colors: the organization of the petroleum exporting countries said it expects oil demand to grow by 1.4 million barrels per day (bpd) this year, around steady on its previous forecast and also in line with iea figures.
